#summary Classes provided in Samstyle PHP Framework

= Introduction =

Samstyle PHP Framework contains several classes that are readily available in the framework itself. We've built them for your convenience.

Class files are all found in the folder `class`.

= List of Classes =

Here is a list of classes available in Samstyle PHP Framework and their purpose.

|| *Class* || *Filename* || *Functionality and Support* ||
|| [Classes_bit bit] || bit.class.php || To support the manipulation of bits ||
|| [Classes_firebug firebug] || firebug.class.php || Support server-side debugging with Firebug ||
|| [Classes_form form] || form.class.php || Provides support for form generation ||
|| [Classes_html html] || html.class.php || Support for HTML code generation ||
|| [Classes_http http] || http.class.php || Provides support for HTTP ||
|| [Classes_limit limit] || limit.class.php || Allows you to check on limit to a certain feature, functionality or page. [http://www.codinghorror.com/blog/archives/001228.html Understand more]. ||
|| [Classes_lang lang] || lang.class.php || Allows translation between languages ||
|| [Classes_php php] || php.class.php || Provides added support and functionality to current PHP's pool of functions ||
|| [Classes_pwd pwd] || pwd.class.php || Password hashing with secured salting and verification ||
|| [Classes_validate validate] || validate.class.php || validates variables against certain patterns and so on ||
|| [Classes_enum enum] || enum.class.php || provides a enumerator class similar to other languages for those who feel comfortable working with enumerators. ||
